ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List a users contact methods
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List a users contact methods
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List contact methods of your PagerDuty user.
Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List a user's contact methods

List contact methods of your PagerDuty user. Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)

Method: Get

OperationID: getUserContactMethods

EndPoint:

/users/{id}/contact_methods
